title: 如何取消普通玩家彩色字体和/me权限？
author: Jeffchoy
txt_content:
请问如何取消普通玩家的/me /nick  彩色字体（包括牌子的
我这样打指令他们还是可以用.....
mangdelp builder essentials.color
mangdelp builder essentials.nick
mangdelp builder essentials.me
他们还是可以
使用这三项权限...求解...
我连default组都取消了......还是可以.....

replies.author: q394960445
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: star_lord
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddpbuilder -essentials.color
/mangaddp builder -essentials.nick
/mangaddp builder -essentials.me

直接复制进去就可以了，注意前面有个“-”

replies.author: 落日光辉
replies.txt_content: 请问默认组是设置为什么的

replies.author: rxffr
replies.txt_content:
Wowaka 发表于 2015-6-6 21:16
essentials的配置文件里看看
ess仔细阅读

replies.author: Jeffchoy
replies.txt_content:
q394960445 发表于 2015-6-6 18:49
/mangdelp g:essentials_builder essentials.me
/mangdelp g:essentials_builder essentials.chat.color
/m ...
谢谢你！！！终于解决了！！你帮我大忙了！！
